subject: Public Speaking
title: Greta Thunberg: Youth Power
description: A micro-lesson that makes Greta Thunberg: Youth Power usable.

hook.text: Greta was a teenager when she spoke on climate. Adults listened.

buildup.text: Her power came from moral urgency and clarity, not credentials.

discovery.text: She spoke without jargon, directly about existential threat.

twist.text: Her youth was her credibility. She lives with consequences.

climax.text: In crisis, authenticity and clarity trump credentials.

punchline.text: Speak truth urgently. The world listens.
